breadcrumbs.sql: select c_start_dt from c where c_id=@c_parent_id

lov.sql: select c_id codeval,c_name codetxt from c order by c_name

default.sql: select c_name||' :: Child' from c where c_id = @c_parent_id

fields.name: c_entry_dt
fields.caption: Entry Date
fields.default: js:(function(){ console.log(data); debugger; return new Date()})()

fields.name: c_start_dt
fields.caption: Start Date
fields.default: js:(function(){ /* if parent start date > current date, return parent date */ console.log(data); debugger; return new Date()})()
